data.name: Lucid9 - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack of Lucid9: Inciting Incident. This soundtrack DLC contains the 37 tracks used in the game in both 320kbps MP3 and WAV formats, composed by Ultra Kitsune, Breezee, Ziassan, Haven235, and Blue Wolfie.

List of tracks:

  • Urban Disturbance - 03:45
  • Usual Routine - 02:47
  • Hustle and Bustle - 02:52
  • Peaceful Days - 03:05
  • Consequences of a Fool - 03:25
  • Marvelous Masa - 00:51
  • Gover Mecher - 02:57
  • Victory in Sight - 03:10
  • Adult Talk - 03:35
  • Empty Eyes - 03:40
  • Optimist in Shining Armor - 02:16
  • Stardust - 03:15
  • Rationality - 03:47
  • Visions From My Soul - 02:40
  • Unpredictable Youth - 03:26
  • Eccentric Detective - 03:28
  • Process of Elimination - 03:06
  • Instinctive Suspicion - 01:59
  • Instinctive Suspicion - Music Box - 01:56
  • Instinctive Suspicion - Ominous - 01:55
  • Equanimity - 04:49
  • Anxiety - 02:53
  • Tasteless - 02:21
  • Introspection - 03:18
  • Melancholy - 02:23
  • Melancholy - Heavy - 03:41
  • Melancholy - Emotional - 03:05
  • Hollow - 02:11
  • Restless - 03:24
  • Asphyxia - 01:52
  • Electrifying Tension - 02:51
  • Warm Feeling - 01:49
  • Secrets of Isamu - 03:49
  • Depths - 04:34
  • Depths (Sudden) - 03:47
  • Disturbed - 03:05
  • Urban Disturbance - Dark - 02:41
